overview: The duties and jobs of a secretary are never done! Welcome to the fourth installment of Secretaries! On the job and looking to serve with excellence! Filing, typing, sucking and fucking - it is all in a day's work. This meeting is for official fucking business. Starring AVN Award winner Brooklyn Lee and other starlets like Aleska Diamond, Angelica Heart, Katalin and Zafina!
title: Secretaries 4
